text: Jamal Musiala (born 26 February 2003) is a German footballer. He plays as an attacking midfielder for Bayern Munich. Musiala was born in Germany to a British-Nigerian father and German mother and was raised mainly in England. Musiala represented both Germany and England at youth level, and chose Germany national football team for future games in February 2021. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League DFB-Pokal Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayern Munich II 2019–20 3.
